Row.Text: Come, and we will walk strange shores and make them familiar. And on returning find our familiar shores strange.
We are well met upon the traveler's road. At least I hope so!

I am no soldier. But I employ them. Here they come.
A future traveler will not be able to tell our dead from yours.
In the empty plain I have seen men's forms turned to stone, and all around them their cities nothing but dust. Is that me? Shall I gaze sightless upon the plain for all eternity? Ah, what a fate.
